fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
Base: $1
1 House: $5
2 Houses: $10
3 Houses: $15
4 Houses: $20

Houses cost $35 each

fields.name: Stop-in Effects:
fields.value: The player who lands here rolls a d6. If they roll 1+(# of houses on this property) or less, they are mugged and lose $100 + $100 x # of houses on this property. The owner must also roll this, but the conditions are always as if there were no houses for them.
